text: z Strengthen walking and cycling connections to Poplar DLR station, Poplar High Street, East India Dock Road and Canary Wharf station. Green grid improvements should be delivered along Poplar High Street and through the site towards Poplar DLR station, with good quality onward connections to Poplar Recreation Ground and across Aspen Way. Environment and public realm z Create a positive sense of place with a public square and public green open space that integrates north-south links and Poplar DLR station, and improve the quality of spaces around and between buildings and movement through the area. z Across the South Poplar Masterplan area, development should coordinate to manage surface water to enable discharge into the docks to the south. 460 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO CONTENTS 4.2 Billingsgate Market Figure 44: 4.2 Billingsgate Market (indicative) SITE ALLOCATIONSINTRODUCTION Tower Hamlets Local Plan 461
